The Best Games Out There

Here at Indican GameWarrior you can play games on a PC and a smartphone. We allow you to play the games Ninja, Snake, Tic-Tac-Toe, Planet Defense, and more! Some of which cost money ($15.99 at the least), and some are free, like Ninja and Snake...

Recent Games

New

Ninja

Want fun? You will be a complete ninja with Ninja. Let's try to get the highest score by cutting the cubes.

New

Snake

Snake is a video game genre where the player maneuvers a growing line that becomes a primary obstacle to itself.

New

Tic-Tac-Toe

Tic-Tac-Toe is a two-player game in which the players fill up nine empty rectangles in a table. Player 1[X] Player 2[O]

New

Planet Defense

Protect the planet! Destroy the asteroids to save your people! It's my first canvas game, enjoy it!
